# ä¼ é€’åŒ¿åå†…éƒ¨ç±»ç±»


public class CreateThread {

  public static void main(String[] args) {
    // JDK  8ä¹‹å‰åˆ›å»ºçº¿ç¨‹
    new Thread(
            new Runnable() {
              @Override
              public void run() {
                System.out.println("this is a threadï¼" + Thread.currentThread().getName());
              }
            })
        .start();
    // JDK  8åˆ›å»ºçº¿ç¨‹
    new Thread(()->System.out.println("this is a thread of lambda " + Thread.currentThread().getName())).start();
  }
}

# éå†é›†åˆ

  public static void main(String[] args) {

    List<String> list = Arrays.asList("one","two","three","four","five","six","seven");
    System.out.println("\n------JDK8ä¹‹å‰çš„éå†æ–¹å¼----------");
    for(String data:list){
      System.out.print(data+"\t");
    }

    System.out.println("\n\n\n------JDK8ä¹‹åçš„éå†æ–¹å¼----------");
    list.forEach(data -> System.out.print(data + "\t"));
  }

# æ¥å£å¼ç¼–ç¨‹


  public static void main(String[] args) {

    List<String> list = Arrays.asList("one", "two", "three", "four", "five", "six", "seven");

    System.out.println("ä»¥få¼€å¤´çš„æ•°æ®ä¿¡æ¯ï¼š");
    filter(list, (str) -> str.toString().startsWith("f"));

    System.out.println("ä»¥eç»“å°¾çš„æ•°æ®ä¿¡æ¯ï¼š");
    filter(list, (str) -> str.toString().endsWith("e"));

    System.out.println("è¾“å‡ºå…¨éƒ¨æ•°æ®ï¼š");
    filter(list, (str) ->true);

    System.out.println("è¾“å‡ºé•¿åº¦å¤§äºç­‰äº4çš„æ•°æ®ï¼š");
    filter(list, (str) -> str.toString().length() >= 4);
  }

  public static void filter(List<String> names, Predicate condition) {
    for (String name : names) {
      if (condition.test(name)) {
        System.out.print(name + "\t ");
      }
    }
    System.out.println();
  }

# éå†é›†åˆå¹¶å¤„ç†æ•°æ®

 public static void main(String[] args) {
    System.out.println("ä¸ä½¿ç”¨lambdaè¡¨è¾¾å¼ä¸ºæ¯ä¸ªè®¢å•åŠ ä¸Š12%çš„ç¨");
    List<Integer> costBeforeTax = Arrays.asList(100, 200, 300, 400, 500);
    for (Integer cost : costBeforeTax) {
      double price = cost + .12 * cost;
      System.out.print(price + "\t");
    }
    System.out.println();

    System.out.println("ä½¿ç”¨lambdaè¡¨è¾¾å¼ä¸ºæ¯ä¸ªè®¢å•åŠ ä¸Š12%çš„ç¨");
    costBeforeTax
        .stream()
        .map(cost -> cost + cost * .12)
        .collect(Collectors.toList())
        .forEach(data -> System.out.print(data + "\t"));

  }

# è¿‡æ»¤æ•°æ®

  public static void main(String[] args) {
    List<String> list = Arrays.asList("1", "2", "3", "2", "1", "4", "2");
    List<String> collect = list.stream().distinct().collect(Collectors.toList());

    System.out.println("æºæ•°æ®");
    list.forEach(data -> System.out.print(data + "\t"));

    System.out.println("\n\nè¿‡æ»¤åçš„æ•°æ®æº");
    collect.forEach(data -> System.out.print(data + "\t"));
  }

# ç»Ÿè®¡æ•°æ®ä¿¡æ¯

  public static void main(String[] args) {

    ArrayList<String> arrayList = new ArrayList<>(16);

    for (int i = 0; i < 5; i++) {
      arrayList.add(String.valueOf(Math.random()));
    }

    arrayList.forEach(data -> System.out.print(data + "\t"));
    System.out.println();

    DoubleSummaryStatistics statistics =
        arrayList.stream().mapToDouble((x) -> Double.parseDouble(x)).summaryStatistics();

    System.out.println("Max = " + statistics.getMax());
    System.out.println("Min = " + statistics.getMin());
    System.out.println("Average = " + statistics.getAverage());
    System.out.println("Sum = " + statistics.getSum());
  }
